SSG_Tools.Fonts
Class RomanTriplex

java.lang.Object
  SSG_Tools.Fonts.StrokeFont
      SSG_Tools.Fonts.RomanTriplex

public class RomanTriplex
extends StrokeFont

This class stores the data for the font: RomanTriplex that was derived from the public domain Hershey font data, distributed on the USENET network. The Hershey Fonts were originally digitized by Dr. Allen V. Hershey, a mathematical physicist, while working at the U.S. Naval Weapons Laboratory in Dahlgren, Virginia during the 1960's The USENET distribution was originally created by: James Hurt Cognition, Inc. 900 Technology Park Drive Billerica, MA 01821 The data in this class was produced from the *.txf file form of the data produced by Dennis Mikkelson from the data distributed on USENET.

Constructor Summary

          Construct a font object for the font RomanTriplex to be used with the StrokeText class.

Constructor Detail

RomanTriplex

public RomanTriplex()
Construct a font object for the font RomanTriplex to be used with the StrokeText class. To draw text in 3D, pass an instance of this font along with the string to the constructor of the StrokeText class, and then add the StrokeText object to the ThreeD_GL_Panel where the string should be drawn.
